attributes.action: Change school uniform within Helena Romanes School.
attributes.additional_details: I'm one of many pupils that want changes made to the uniform at our school and I feel our opinions need to be voiced.
attributes.background: I would like the students to feel comfortable in the uniform they wear and therefore i'm going to raise awareness of the unhappiness of students locally.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual schools.
